name: It is a Loop
description:
**Please rate my game on my Ludam Dare Submission Page**

Hello,

This is my first time competing in Ludum Dare. I was first shown LD46 by Quill18 and have spent the past 6 months learning game dev competing in GMTK 2020 along the way.

Theme: Stuck In A Loop

This game was built using Godot 3.2.3 (GLES2), Asprite for graphics, and SFXR for sound.

Any and all feedback is welcome!

Cheers,
Aarimous

GitHub Repo
